data.name: The Sentinel Remake
data.detailed_description:
SENTINEL ISLAND

This island, which contains a primitive tribe, is ruled by a ruler named Wandal. Wandal; for various reasons, it has banned development, science and technology on the island and is applying an oppressive administration to its people. However, some of the Sentinel people will not remain silent against this oppressive government.


A CIVILIZED MAN IN PRIMILITY

If you were faced with a person who lived five thousand years ago right now, what would you do to defend yourself against him? This is exactly what Bill Black lives through. Help Bill Black take advantage of the modern world in a world of physically stronger people. Defend yourself with fire; by generating electricity, using optics, combining various technological tools, and many more, shine a light on the path of your own salvation and the future of the Sentinels with your torch.


About the Game

Explore the social structure of Sentinel Island, which is home to a primitive life in the modern world, and witness the rise of the leader Wandal. As a modern man, light up the darkness of this wild island with your torch. You'll escape, hide, and defend yourself with the power of civilization against Wandal's army as you solve puzzles all over the island. You will face what you left behind, try not to repeat your mistakes, and you will begin to question what "true civilization" means. The Sentinel Remake is a first-person puzzle and survival horror game. Bring the main character Bill Black to life, help him solve different puzzles on the island and witness Bill's past. Travel all over the island and meet "people" with different characters. A civilized man's struggle against a primitive world is about to begin.
